Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 96 %

Wind: ESE 9 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near noon. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening then becoming southeast 30 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 60 near the water. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
